title: User profiles in Windows - update v4
prerequisite:
There are two types of workstations:


NOTE: The majority of workstations are Standard.

The user profiles available on your workstation are as follows:

CAUTION: These user profiles only concern workstations. Windows and Linux servers are not affected.

To make a profile modification request, please use the request module.

The procedure is now complete.
introduction:
Administration rights are necessary in particular in the following cases:

  • Debugs
  • Software requirements
  • Installation of packages, software

choices.choiceTitle: Creation of the administration account on my computer
choices.choiceDescription:
You can check in My Digital Workplace "Accounts & Passwords" profile page that your administration rights already exist by consulting the Accounts and passwords page.


If you do not have an account like here, you can request the modification of profile, directly from the page by clicking on Create my account.

choices.choiceTitle: Activation for 24 hours of my administration right
choices.choiceDescription: If you already have an extended profile, you can activate your administration rights from the Accounts and passwords page:
